subject: Multiple Test Cases
msgSnippet: Hi, I am new to JUnit and need some clarification. 1.Do we need to create a Test-case class for every class we need to test. 2.Is there a way to test multiple
messageBody:
Hi,
I am new to JUnit and need some clarification.
1.Do we need to create a Test-case class for every
class we need to test.
2.Is there a way to test multiple classes.

Thanks in advance
Gopinath
